title: Need some help with the loading into games
body:
Today I was playing a game and the loading screen took forever, I was like ok somebody might have some bad wifi, but then i didnt connect and the clock timer was at like 13 minutes but everyone was only lvl 2? Can anyone explain to me what is happing?
{{champion:157}} {{summoner:13}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Hmmmm sounds like your network was hitting some kind of snag on it's way to connecting with the game server you were playing on. Sometimes this can happen if your network is getting blocked by something like firewalls/antivirus or by not having the best settings in place. Run through this FAQ on [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) testing changes in a custom game, but let me know if those steps aren't helping.
uh i dont use forums that much can u tell me how i do that please?

Follow the steps in the guide I linked -> [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

If you have problems with any of the steps feel free to hit up our tech agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
I tried your steps and it works thanks very much for u to help me out
